revision.comment: Created page with "Possibly: A treatise on mineral waters. In two volumes. By Donald Monro, M.D. physician to His Majesty's army and to St. George's Hospital, F.R.S. (London : Sold by D. Wilson..."
revision.text: Possibly: A treatise on mineral waters. In two volumes. By Donald Monro, M.D. physician to His Majesty's army and to St. George's Hospital, F.R.S. (London : Sold by D. Wilson and G. Nichol, in the Strand and T. Durham, Charing Cross, and other Booksellers in Town., MDCCLXX. [1770]). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b2505147~S1
